outputs.output_descr: Officials of Ministries Trade or Commerce, Planning and Finance as well as other key stakeholders including the private sector and CSOs from 8 countries equipped with tools and information to enhance trade competitiveness and formulate employment- and gender-responsive trade policies.

Key stakeholders (including regional organizations, Trade/Commerce/Planning Ministries of Member States and private sector actors)  have access to knowledge products and participate in policy dialogues to implement pro-poor regional integration strategies.

project_descr: Asia-Pacific Trade and Investment Initiative (Phase III)
project_title: Asia-Pacific Trade and Investment Initiative (Phase III)
